question.title: Unordered Set Hash Function
question.content:
You are given a set and a string. You need to return the hash value of the given string.

Example:

Input: FAR
Output: -1651365760323248093

Constraints:
1 <= size of string <= 10

rephrased.body: Given a string, calculate and return its hash value.
constraints: The length of the string will be between 1 and 10 characters, inclusive.

testcases.explanation: This is the hash value of the string "FAR".
